Get the file name for a yspec object

ys_spec_file.Rd

This read from the yspec object meta data via get_meta.

ys_spec_file(x)

Arguments

x

a yspec object

Examples

spec <- load_spec_ex()
ys_spec_file(spec)
#> [1] "/private/var/folders/xb/hqmfzgl95fq8mx6tjxkzb71r0000gn/T/RtmpM2lyhM/temp_libpath15b747c3ae2ad/yspec/spec/spec.yml"
